title: kaga_kai_ni_(kancolle)
body:
[[Kaga (kancolle)|]] obtained her second remodels with the August 27th 2020 update, termed Kai Ni, Kai Ni E and Kai Ni Go.

Her outfit and gear has all the changes that were given to [[Akagi (Kancolle)|Akagi]] before her (ribbon-trimmed sleeves, bow-less [[tasuki]], thighhigh gaiters, etc.), except in blue. Kai Ni and Kai Ni E are analogous to Akagi's [[Akagi Kai Ni (Kancolle)|remodels]]  (standard CV and night-capable CV(n), respectively) while Kai Ni Go is a remodel based on her modern counterpart (JMSDF DDH) and is analogous to [[Hyuuga (Kancolle)|Hyuuga]]'s [[Hyuuga Kai Ni (Kancolle)|remodel]].

The main differences between her models is that, the Kai Ni Go she comes with [[F6F Hellcat]]s and [[TBF Avenger]]s in her CG
 
h4. Appearance

* !post #4071465: Kai Ni (Default)
* !post #4071460: Kai Ni E (Night Carrier)
* !post #4071462: Kai Ni Go (CVH)

title: mahou_shoujo_ikusei_keikaku_double_shadow
body: Magical Girl Raising Project Double Shadow also known simply as Double Shadow, is a reading drama for the [[Mahou Shoujo Ikusei Keikaku|Magical Girl Raising Project]] series. The reading drama features two stories, Double Shadow and The Blue Magical Girl Asserts Herself Ver. 2 (青い魔法少女の自己主張Ver.2). It was performed at Sogetsu Hall in Minato City, Tokyo.

title: roy_mustang
body:
A character in [[Fullmetal Alchemist]]. Known as the "Flame Alchemist", he is a colonel in Amestris' military and [[Edward Elric]]'s superior.

He is a man with [[black hair]] and [[black eyes]]. He is usually seen wearing the [[Amestris military uniform]] as well as [[white gloves]] with [[magic circle|transmutation circles]] drawn on them with which he performs his flame alchemy.

title: edward_elric
body:
The protagonist from [[Fullmetal Alchemist]]. He is the older brother of [[Alphonse Elric]] and son of [[Trisha Elric]] and [[Van Hohenheim]].

He is a young teen with [[blonde hair]] and [[yellow eyes]]. His hair is done in a [[ponytail]] and he often wears a [[red cloak]] with [[black shirt]], [[black pants|pants]], and [[white gloves]].

He is noticeably short for his age, something which causes him great annoyance when mentioned.

He also has [[automail]] for his right arm and left leg due to losing both in an alchemy accident. These features are what gives him his eponymous nickname, the Fullmetal Alchemist.
other_names: エドワード・エルリック

title: black_tide_(racehorse)
body:
[tn]Named after the Kuroshio current, "Black Tide" being a literal translation of "Kuroshio".[/tn]

[table]
[body]
[tr]
[td]Sire:[/td]
[td][[Sunday Silence (racehorse)|]][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Grandsire:[/td]
[td][[Halo (racehorse)|]][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Dam:[/td]
[td][[Wind in Her Hair (racehorse)|]][/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Damsire:[/td]
[td][[Alzao (racehorse)|]][/td]
[/tr]
[/body]
[/table]

Japanese [[horse|racehorse]]. Sired by [[Sunday Silence (racehorse)|]] and foaled by [[Wind in Her Hair (racehorse)|]], he is [[Deep Impact (racehorse)|]]'s full elder brother. While he only has a single G2 victory (The 2004 Spring Stakes), he went to stud thanks to Deep Impact's exploits implying he might have a chance there. Indeed, Black Tide managed to sire one of Japan's greatest racehorses with [[Kitasan Black (racehorse)|]]. However, it would take 10 years before he could sire a second G1 winner with Kamunyak, winner of the 2025 Japanese Oaks.

title: fullmetal_alchemist
body:
[b]Fullmetal Alchemist[/b] ([i]Hagane no Renkinjutsushi[/i]) is a Japanese [[Steampunk]] manga series written and illustrated by [[Arakawa Hiromu]], with two anime adaptations made by Bones studio.

After a failed attempt to resurrect their dead mother via alchemy, [[Edward Elric]] lost his left leg, while his younger brother [[Alphonse Elric|Alphonse]] lost his entire body, forcing the former to sacrifice his right arm to affix Alphonse's soul into a suit of armor. After gaining [[automail]] prosthetics from childhood friend and mechanic [[Winry Rockbell]], Edward enlists into the Amestris State Military to seek the Philosopher's Stone, hoping to restore their bodies, unaware of its secrets.

h4. Alchemists

* [[Edward Elric]]
* [[Alphonse Elric]]
* [[Roy Mustang]]
* [[Izumi Curtis]]
* [[Van Hohenheim]]
* [[Alex Louis Armstrong]]
* [[Basque Gran]]
* [[Berthold Hawkeye]]

A former division of [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber|VTubers]] specifically focused/themed on gaming. The group formally existed from May 2018 until early 2019 when it was consolidated under a single Nijisanji banner. Its members continue to refer to themselves as the "Ex-Gamers".

title: alphonse_elric
body:
A character from [[Fullmetal Alchemist]] and younger brother of [[Edward Elric]], referred to as "Al" for short.

Alphonse's soul is bonded to a suit of [[armor]] after a botched attempt by Edward and him to revive their mother had cost him his entire body in exchange.

The calmer of the two, Al is tasked with keeping his brother in check. Due to Edward's shorter stature, especially compared to his larger suit of armor, he is often mistakened as the older brother by others (much to Ed's chagrin) and for a robot by those outside the fanbase.

This tag applies to both his human form and suit of armor form.
other_names: アルフォンス・エルリック

title: scp-8900-ex
body:
An Explained, formerly Keter, [[SCP Foundation|SCP]] that began affecting the public and causing their perception of color to change irreversibly. After a massive breach occured which effectively caused the SCP to infect everyone, O5 uses a subtle amnesiac to make it seem as if this color perception was always the way it was, this earning this SCP the "Explained" tag and reclassification.

On Pixiv and NicoNico, this tag is used similarly to relay the concept of a shocking, world-shattering revelation affecting a character in some way.

title: nipple_penetration
body:
When an object is inserted inside one's [[nipples]], thus the nipple being penetrated.

Can include fingers, needles, penises, tentacles and even other nipples.

title: about:custom_css_style
the_gate_(fma)
body: Also known as the Gate of Truth, or Gate of Alchemy, it is a metaphysical gate in [[Fullmetal Alchemist]] found in the realm of [[Truth (fma)|]]. It is a large, floating metal gate with the [[Tree of Life]] inscribed upon it.

title: miko_kubota
body:
One of the two protagonists from [[Glitch Techs]]. 

Miko is a Japanese-American heavy-bottomed teenager of medium height, with fair skin, pink-tinted cheeks and nose, black eyes and long, straight blue-violet hair with magenta sheens, trimmed in a hime cut with [[blunt bangs]]. When she is wearing her employee uniform, her hair is put up into a bun, which she keeps one long lock of hair out.

Miko has multiple main outfits, such as her normal clothes. She also uses her Glitch Tech uniform to fight and capture glitches.

Her normal clothes include a [[black tank top]] covered with a [[yellow shirt|yellow]] [[cat print|cat]] [[t-shirt]], [[purple leggings]], a [[blue hoodie]] wrapped around her waist, [[red socks|red]] and [[white socks]], [[grey boots]], and an [[orange wristband]].

Miko‘s employee outfit consists of a [[blue shirt|blue]] polo shirt with a white H embedded onto it, [[white pants]], and [[white shoes]].

Her Glitch Tech uniform consists of a [[white suit]], a black chest plate with a white H embedded onto it, [[black sleeves]] and knee padding, a Glitch Tech glove, clear classes, and [[white shoes|white]] & [[pink shoes|pink sneakers]].

h4. External links

* "Glitch Techs Wiki: Miko Kubota":[https://glitchtechs.fandom.com/wiki/Miko_Kubota]

title: deep_bond_(racehorse)
body:
[tn]His name is a combination of his sire and grandsire's names. ([b]Deep[/b] Impact + Kizuna [b]"Bond"[/b]) [/tn]

[table]
[body]
[tr]
[td]Sire:[/td]
[td][[Kizuna (Racehorse)|]] [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Grandsire:[/td]
[td][[Deep Impact (Racehorse)|]] [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Dam:[/td]
[td][[Zephyranthes (Racehorse)|]] [/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]Damsire:[/td]
[td][[King Halo (Racehorse)|]] [/td]
[/tr]
[/body]
[/table]

Japanese [[horse|racehorse]]. He is a brown horse (i.e. near black) with no leg markings and a large star facial marking. He is of the same owner as [[Contrail (racehorse)|]] as well as his contemporary.

He is infamous for ironically being a slow-natured horse. His "PuBo" nickname is also an expression of his slow nature[tn][i]-pubo[/i][/tn]. He also has another "Mo-i" nickname derived from a cry the horse allegedly made on camera, which was instantly picked up by the Internet for the cry being so un-horse-like (the "cry's" actual source is disputed).

He also happens to be Japan's racehorse with the highest earnings without any G1 wins, thanks to his 4 consecutive podium finishes at the Spring Tenno-sho (finishing 2nd, 2nd, 2nd and 3rd). While he surpasses [[Nice Nature (racehorse)|]] in earnings, races in the 2020's give significantly more earnings than races in the 1990's and Nice Nature ran more races in general. Deep Bond retired after the 2024 [[Arima Kinen]] and has since become a leading horse at [[Kyoto Racecourse]], the same race track that he excelled at.

h5. Related
* [[Wada Ryuji]] - Main jockey
* [[Miyuki Hideaki]] - Main jockey, succeeded Wada

title: forest_musician_cranberry_gaiden:_magical_girl_raising_project_unripe_duet
body:
Forest Musician Cranberry Gaiden: Magical Girl Raising Project Unripe Duet, or simply Unripe Duet, is a reading drama based on [[Cranberry (Mahoiku)|Cranberry]] released on January 27th, 2023.

h4. Summary

“Singing those songs of our early days once again.”

Unripe Duet follows [[Miiya Octave]], a magical girl who has just woken up from a 20 year-long coma, [[Theremin Doll]], a freelancer journalist, and their journey into finding [[Cranberry (Mahoiku)|Musician Of The Forest, Cranberry]]. The two of them go through a variety of different magical girl connections, learning more about Cranberry’s history and her as a person.

Meanwhile, Cranberry and Fav begin preparing a selection exam for some Magical Girls that they have their eyes on…

h4. External links

* "Wiki":[https://mahou-shoujo-ikusei-keikaku.fandom.com/wiki/Unripe_Duet]
other_names: 森の音楽家クラムベリー外伝

title: daemon_x_machina
body:
A third-person [[mecha]] action game developed by Marvelous, released for [[Nintendo Switch]] in 2019 and later ported to [[computer|PC]] in 2020. The game was produced by [[Armored Core]] producer [[Tsukada Kenichiro]], and is considered by many fans to be a spiritual successor to the franchise with it's fast-paced gameplay and in depth mecha customization.

Mechanical designs by [[Kawamori Shouji]] and character designs by [[Kozaki Yuusuke]].

title: sasayama_heidayuu
body:
A character in [[Rakudai Ninja Rantarou]].

10 years old, coming from a [[samurai]] family, and a 1st year student from the Ha-class in Ninjutsu Academy. He likes traps and has his entire room rigged with them. He shares his room with [[Yumesaki Sanjirou]], who also enjoys traps.

He has a oval shaped head, [[brown hair]], a [[ponytail]], and [[blunt bangs]]. His eyebrows are brown with sharp edges at the end. He has a small doted eyes with semi circle lines. In his casual, he wears pink sleeves with 3 blue triangles and blue pants.

title: black_sand
body: [b]Black sand[/b] is [[sand]] that is black in color. One type of black sand is a heavy, glossy, partly magnetic mixture of usually fine sands containing minerals such as [[magnetite]], found as part of a [[placer deposit]]. Another type of black sand, found on [[beach]]es near a [[volcano]], consists of tiny fragments of [[basalt]].

title: sand
body:

title: ohhoai
body:
Lit: Ohho-eye

A sexual face expression where a character is having an orgasm and their [[tongue out|tongue is out]], one eye is [[half-closed eyes|half-closed]], and the other is open with [[heart-shaped pupils]]. The term originates from the combination of オッドアイ (odd-eye, aka [[heterochromia]]) and オホ声 (oho voice, a type of sexual moaning or panting).

h4. See also

* [[ahegao]]

h4. External links

* "Pixipedia entry: オッホアイ":[https://dic.pixiv.net/a/%E3%82%AA%E3%83%83%E3%83%9B%E3%82%A2%E3%82%A4]

title: houou_karin
body:
[[Denonbu]] character and the center of Teion International High School's electronic music club in Shibuya area.
Voiced by [[Sukoya Kana]] from Nijisanji.

Karin has [[very long hair|very long]] [[white hair]] with [[red hair|red]], [[blonde hair|yellow]], and [[blue hair|blue]] colored [[streaked hair|streaks]]. She wears a red [[lightning]] shaped [[hair ornament]] and a red [[hairclip]] with a triangle cut out. Her eyes are [[blue eyes|blue]] and [[red eyes|red]].

She wears a red, blue, and white [[jacket]] over a black and white [[shirt]] with multicolored [[buttons]]. She wears an orange and [[white skirt]] with [[black shorts]] underneath, which she pairs with a red [[belt]]. She also wears red [[headphones]].

Karin wears [[mismatched footwear|mismatched shoes]] and [[mismatched legwear|socks]]. On her left leg she wears a short orange sock and a red boot with white laces and black accents, while on her right leg she wears a long red sock and a yellow boot with black laces and white accents.

h4. Official art

* !post #5658371

title: taiga_lucia
body:
[[Denonbu]] character and a member of Teion International High School's [[denonbu|electronic music club]] in Shibuya area.
Voiced by [[Hoshikawa Sara]] from Nijisanji.

Lucia has [[short hair|short]] bright [[blonde hair]] with tufts on either side with white tips that almost appear to be shaped like [[animal ears]]. She has yellow-[[green eyes]].

She wears a white cropped [[jacket]] with a [[fur-trimmed hood|fur-trimmed]] [[hood]]. There is a large white [[zipper]] in the middle, as well as one on each arm. There are black and yellow stripes on her jacket. The chest [[pocket]] features a red triangle. She wears [[black shorts]] with yellow triangle accents, paired with a large green zipper shaped [[belt]].

Lucia has two yellow [[plaster]]s on her right knee in a cross shape. She wears yellow crew [[socks]] underneath black [[boots]] with yellow soles and white buckles, which also feature red triangles.

h4. Official art

* !post #5658361

title: seto_mitsuki
body:
[[Denonbu]] character and member of Teion International High School's electronic music club in Shibuya area.
Voiced by [[Sister Claire]] from Nijisanji.

Mitsuki has [[short hair|short]] [[black hair]] with a [[blue hair|blue]] [[streaked hair|streak]]. She has yellow-[[green eyes]], and wears two red crossed [[hairclip]]s.

She wears a [[blue dress]] with straps, and a black [[belt]] above her waist. On top of this, she wears a black [[leather jacket]] with a red triangle pin and red accents. Around her neck, she wears a [[black choker]] with red and blue decorations. She also wears black and blue [[ring]]s on her right hand, along with a red triangle ring and a blue [[bracelet]] on her left.

Mitsuki wears [[black socks]], with the [[asymmetrical legwear|right]] reaching to at least her [[skirt]] and the left ending above her knee. She wears black heeled [[boots]] with "PETRICHOR" written on them, along with red zip-ties around them.

title: cryptid
body:
A cryptid refers to an animal (or monster or creature) whose existence is unsubstantiated by mainstream science. They are the subjects of the pseudoscience of cryptozoology.

The favored term in Japan for cryptids is "Unindentified Mysterious Animal" or "UMA", displaying the parallels with "[[UFO]]" (and the parallels of cryptozoology and ufology) as well as a source of [[horse]] jokes, particularly in [[Umamusume]] circles as actual horses do not exist in the setting where famous race horses are turned in to girls.

[[Kemono Friends]] uses the term "UMA" to designate friends based on cryptids, animal [[traditional youkai]] and other mythical and folkloral creatures, fictional animal characters, the [[Tachikoma]] (and other [[Ghost in the Shell]] robot Friends) and hybrids of any of the above with real animals.

title: skyfish_(cryptid)
body:
A type of [[cryptid]], sighted on cameras that are rapidly descending from extreme heights. Also known as “rods”. They are actually caused by the wingbeats of flying insects.

h4. In media

* Controlled by the [[Stand (Jojo)|]] [[Sky High (stand)|]] in [[Stone Ocean]] in order to absorb the body heat of their victims
* As an extremely rare enemy in [[Castlevania: Aria of Sorrow]]
* One of the forms taken by [[Marcille's familiar]] in [[Dungeon Meshi]]

h4. See also
* [[Skyfish (Kemono Friends)]] 
* " Wikipedia article":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rod_(optical_phenomenon)]

title: sky_high_(stand)
body:
A [[stand (jojo)|]] in [[Stone Ocean]].
It can take command of [[skyfish (cryptid)|Rods]] around it.

Namesake is likely "Sky High", a song by British pop music group Jigsaw, released as a single in August 1975 in the US and on 26 September 1975 in the UK with "Brand New Love Affair" as the B-side.

body:
The 5th [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[Vinesauce]]'s [[Laimu (VTuber)|]], debuting in August 2025. 

Having a [[summer]] theme, this costume consists of swimwear, a [[bikini]], a [[frills|frilled]] [[microskirt]], and, alternatively, a [[sundress]]. She can wear pink [[heart-shaped_eyewear|heart-shaped glasses]] or a [[sun hat]]. She can cover up the bikini with a frilled [[crop top]] and [[miniskirt]]. She has a [[gold thighlet]] on her right thigh, a [[gold choker]] around her neck, and a green [[wristwatch]] on her right wrist.

For her [[official alternate hairstyle|official hairstyle]] in this costume, her hair is tied into [[twin braids]], or alternatively, a [[ponytail]].

title: laimu_(vtuber)
body:
[i]Not to be confused with [[Lime (Vtuber)|]].[/i]

An English-speaking [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]] and a member of [[Vinesauce]]. Streaming since 2011, she debuted as a VTuber in September of 2021.

She has since gone on to grow significantly, having collaborated with other VTubers like [[Snuffy (Vtuber)|]], [[Dokibird]], and [[Mint Fantome]], among many others, such as [[Bao (Vtuber)|]], [[Matara Kan]], and many other [[VShojo]] girls.

She is a [[lime (Fruit)|]]-themed [[ferret]] [[ferret girl|girl]], though before debuting as a VTuber, she was portrayed as a [[seal (animal)|]].

When streaming with Dokibird, Mint Fantome, and Snuffy, they are known as the "Sloppy Sisters."

title: nino_(fire_emblem)
body:
A playable character from [[Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade]]. She is a former member of the Black Fang, being [[Sonia (fire emblem: the blazing blade)|]]'s adoptive daughter, and eventually becomes the mother of [[Raigh (fire_emblem)|]] and [[Lugh (fire emblem)|]] from [[Fire Emblem: The Binding Blade]].

Nino has [[short hair|short]] [[green hair]] and [[blue eyes]]. She is almost always seen wearing a [[purple hairband]] and a [[purple cape]]. Her usual attire also includes a [[blue vest]], a white outfit with [[long sleeves]], that seem to closely resemble a [[white dress]], though can be alternatively interpreted in art as [[white skirt]]/[[white shirt|shirt]] combo. She also uses two [[belt|belts]] (one of them with a [[pouch]]) and a blue piece that resembles a vest.
 
CV: Yuki Kana (JP), Sarah Blandy (EN)

title: amai_hiyo
body:
An artist-turned-[[indie virtual youtuber|indie]] [[virtual YouTuber]]. A sweet-loving girl who calls her fans/listeners "nii-nii" (shortened from "onii-chan"). She is a fast learner who've learned English and Spanish to communicate with her fans, as well as had a sizeable knowledge of western meme culture.

Her [[amai hiyo (old design)|original appearance]] consisted of her wearing a [[serafuku]] with a [[beret]] with a 4-leaf clover symbol on it. She has a medium-length brown-hair in [[low twintails]] and [[brown eyes]].

On August 29, 2020, Hiyo debuted her [[amai hiyo (1st costume)|new character design]]. Aside that her hair becomes slightly messier and thicker is she has [[cat ears]] and [[cat tail]], as well as a 4-leaf clover shaped pupil. She now wear a dress with a buruma underneath along with white thighhighs.

Her [[amai hiyo (2nd costume)|second costume]], revealed on February 2021, consisted of a white [[jacket]], a pink [[camisole]] and a pink short pants.

Her [[amai hiyo (3rd costume)|third costume]], revealed on April 2021, features a much smaller figure (akin to a [[child]]), wearing a pink dress and with a shorter hair. Her [[amai hiyo (4th costume)|fourth costume]], revealed on May 2022, gives this smaller figure a unique [[Chinese clothes|Chinese-inspired]] look.

Her [[amai hiyo (5th costume)|fifth costume]], revealed on Christmas 2022, features a drastic character change, as she is now depicted as an adult with [[large breasts]] and [[very long hair]]. Her outfit consists of a black-and-white [[china dress]] optionally worn over with a [[off shoulder]] [[short dress]].

In August 2023, she founded the group "Kitten Party":[https://www.youtube.com/@KittenParty222] with fellow VTubers [[Tatamaru (Vtuber)|]], [[Sorano Toa]], and [[Nekone Suzu]], with her drawing illustration-only designs for each member, including herself (post #6692198).

h4. See also

* [[Ekakibito]] - her artist pen name

h4. External links

* Youtube: "Channel Page":https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC04QM30wwa0qMs101Mwz29w
* "Twitter":https://twitter.com/amaihiyo

title: divus_crewel
body:
Divus Crewel is a teacher at Night Raven College in [[Twisted Wonderland]]. He teaches science classes like potions. He has very opinionated views when it comes to fashion. Because he's so particular about fashion, he will not allow even the slightest compromise in regards to what he wears. Compliments students by calling them good boys and berates them by calling them bad boys.

He is associated with the alembic ⚗ ️emoji.

[b]Voice Actor:[/b] [[Itou Kent]]
[b]Age:[/b] 32
[b]Birthday:[/b] April 20

title: magic_pen_(twisted_wonderland)
body:
A tool in [[Twisted Wonderland]]. It's given to students of Night Raven College in order to help channel their magic and control their blot. It physically appears as a [[pen]] with a magestone (gem) in the color associated with their dorm. It can be used as both a wand and a writing instrument.

The breast pockets on the jackets of the [[Night Raven college school uniform]] and [[Night Raven College gym uniform|gym uniform]]s are designed to hold the magic pen, making it appears like a brooch. A key-shaped sheath is worn around the waist in their [[Night Raven College ceremonial robes|ceremonial robes]], and a pocket on the shoulder for their [[Night Raven College gym uniform|gym uniform]].

Instead of a magic pen, [[Grim (twisted wonderland)|]] wears his gem on a collar around his neck. [[Silver Vanrouge]]'s magic pen is larger, making it more closely resemble a dagger. [[Idia Shroud]] and [[Ortho Shroud]] do not utilize them.

Students at Royal Sword Academy are shown to also keep their magestones in their lapels, but it's unclear if they also function as pens.

h4. See also
* [[Overblot]]

h4. External links
* "Magic - Twisted Wonderland Wiki (wiki.gg)":https://twistedwonderland.wiki.gg/wiki/Magic

h4#intro. Intro

This is a list compiling named uniforms that are tagged on Danbooru. A uniform is defined as, "The distinctive clothing worn by members of the same organization or body, or by children attending certain schools." Therefore, different types of uniforms are compiled here, whether they be [[school uniform]]s, restaurant uniforms, [[military uniform]]s, sports uniforms, or otherwise outfits representing an organization or profession.

title: crossbuck
body: The X-shaped road sign used to mark [[railroad crossing]]s. Crossbucks come in various forms and colors depending on the country. The name comes from the fact that the original version of this sign was literally two planks of wood ("bucks") crossed over each other and nailed to a signpost.

title: uss_new_jersey_(bb-62)
body:
[b]USS New Jersey (BB-62)[/b] is the second of the four [i]Iowa[/i]-class  [[battleship]]s built for the [[United States Navy]]. First commissioned in 1943, it became the most decorated battleship of the USN with nineteen battle stars for combat service in the Pacific Theater of [[World War II]], the [[Korean War]], the [[Vietnam War]], and actions in Lebanon and the Persian Gulf. The vessel was decommissioned for the last time in 1991, and is currently a museum ship in Camden, [[New Jersey]].

This tag is for depictions of the actual vessel. For original personifications outside of established franchises, use [[USS New Jersey (BB-62) (Personification)]].

h4. Depictions 

* [[New Jersey (Azur Lane)]]
* [[New Jersey (Warship Girls R)]]
* [[New Jersey (Pacific)]]
* [[New Jersey (Belated Battleships)]]

h4. [i]Iowa[/i]-class battleships 

* [[USS Iowa (BB-61)]]
* [b]USS New Jersey (BB-62)[/b]
* [[USS Missouri (BB-63)]]
* [[USS Wisconsin (BB-64)]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: USS [i]New Jersey[/i]":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USS_New_Jersey_(BB-62)]
* "Official Website":[https://www.battleshipnewjersey.org]

title: silvervale_(summer)
body:
The 5th/[[summer]] [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[VShojo]]'s [[Silvervale]], as seen on "Twitter":[https://twitter.com/yenkoes/status/1413573860507725827], debuting in July 2021.

This costume comes in two forms, a casual dress form, and a swimsuit form. Universal across both, she wears a [[black bikini|black]] [[frilled bikini|frilled]] [[bikini top only|bikini top]], a [[black choker]], a [[thigh strap]], and a [[ankle strap]]. When in her casual dress, she wears a [[black leotard]] woth a [[see-through skirt|see-through]] [[white skirt]], [[fishnet thighhighs]], a [[single glove|single]] [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[fishnet gloves|fishnet glove]], a [[heart]] [[thigh strap]] and a [[black belt]] that she wears on her ankles. She only wears a [[black bikini|black]] [[bikini top only|bikini top]] with [[bikini bottom only|black bikini bottoms]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #8030654: Profile (with skirt)
* !post #8030657: Profile (without skirt)

title: sameko_saba
body:
An English-speaking [[indie virtual youtuber|Indie]] [[virtual youtuber|VTuber]]. Designed by [[Shouu-kun]], while her avatar was drawn by [[Tousaki Shiina]] and animated by [[Cillia]].

Being a [[fish girl]], she naturally has a [[fish tail]], and strangely, [[cat ears]]. She also has [[blue eyes]].

Her default costume consists of a [[white dress|white]] [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[sailor dress]] with a [[blue sailor collar|blue]] [[frilled sailor collar]] and a a [[blue bikini|blue]] [[frilled bikini|frilled]] [[frilled bikini|bikini top]] [[bikini under clothes|underneath]], [[white shorts|white]] [[short shorts]] with a [[highleg bikini|highleg]] [[side-tie bikini bottom]] peeking out and [[brown sandals]].

For her default hairstyle, she has [[very long hair|very long]] [[blonde hair]] with [[blue hair|blue]] and [[white hair|white]] [[streaked hair|streaks]] tied into [[low twintails]] with [[lifebuoy hair ornament]]s, a [[one side up|single side up]] with a [[blue bow|blue]] [[hair bow]], an [[ahoge]], and [[blunt bangs]].

title: art_relay
body: An [i]art relay[/i] is a [[artist_collaboration|collaborative]] drawing activity where multiple artists take turns contributing to a single artwork. Each artist adds or modifies parts of the illustration before passing it along to the next participant, similar to a relay race.

title: magical_mirai_miku_(2019)
body:
The 2019 [[Magical Mirai (Vocaloid)|]] version of [[Hatsune Miku]].

She was illustrated by [[ni02 (asahi nini)|]]. Commonly nicknamed "Circus-chan", she has a circus motif with a [[mini top hat]], [[neck ruff]], [[pink bowtie]], [[white gloves]], [[mismatched legwear]] and vaguely horn-shaped [[hair ornament]]. She carries a [[microphone wand]].

Her theme song is [[Bless Your Breath (vocaloid)|]] by Kurage-P.

h4. Appearance

* !post #3481913: Profile

h4. See also
* [[Magical Mirai Miku]]

* [[List of Vocaloid derivatives]]

title: shiina_yuika
body:
A [[Nijisanji]] [[virtual YouTuber|VTuber]], part of the now-dissolved [[Nijisanji Gamers]] and designed by [[Kamioka Shun'ya]].

She has [[red eyes]] and [[white hair|white]] [[pink hair]], worn in a [[ponytail|long]], [[low ponytail]] and tied with a red [[hair ribbon|ribbon]].

title: straight_(poker)
body: A [[poker]] hand category: any hand where the cards form a numerical sequence, e.g. 2-3-4-5-6 or 9-10-J-Q-K. A straight that is also a [[flush_(poker)|]] is called a [[straight flush (poker)|]].

title: flush_(poker)
body: A [[poker]] hand category: any hand where all cards are of the same suit. A flush that is also a [[straight_(poker)|]] is called a [[straight flush_(poker)|]].

title: devil_survivor_2
body:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Survivor 2 (デビルサバイバー2), is a role-playing game for the Nintendo DS. released July 28 2011 in Japan, February 28 2012 in North America and October 18 2013 in Europe.

title: anguished_one
body:
憂う者 (うれうもの)

Also known as the Anguished One, one of the characters of Shin Megami Tensei: [[Devil Survivor 2]]. A strange man clad in stripes of black and red, his motives and powers are unknown.

Is also known as [spoiler]Alcor[/spoiler] and [spoiler]Al Saiduq/Al Sadak[/spoiler].

title: list_of_nijisanji_units_and_subgroups

title: flesh_storage_bulbs
body: The ball-shaped appendages, sometimes seen on [[Capella Emerada Lugnica]], used to store flesh mass for tranformations and as a counterweight. They are also framed by two pink petals each on the front side, and the bulbs themselves feature pink veins radiating from the stem and purple rings on the opposite end. It should be pointed out that these are not part of her outfit, but a proper body part. However, they can be absent from some of her forms (and some artworks depicting her). If only the petals are visible, the tag should still be applied, since the petals only canonically exist as part of the bulbs.

title: saint_charlos
body: A villainous character from the manga and anime [[One Piece]]. A member of the World Nobles with an absolutely abysmal character, regarding anyone but his co-nobles as mere toys to be played with, broken and thrown away (not that most other "Celestial Dragons" are any better, they all behave as if they have a [[Racism]] Premium Ultra Platinum subscription).

title: otome_(ego_trigger)
body:
One of the main charcters of [[graph (graphiteknight)|]]'s [[Ego Trigger]] project. 

A waitress with a large chest that's been kept under a magic [[sarashi]] for most of her life. She can adjust the wraps to keep her at a certain size. 

Dating [[truck (ego trigger)|Truck]]. [[matt (ego trigger)|Matt]] has a crush on her.

title: matt_(ego_trigger)
body:
An [[original|original character]] by [[graph (graphiteknight)|]], also served as a self-insert for a time. One of the main characters of the [[Ego Trigger]] project.

His "trigger" turns him into a small [[dog boy]]. In genderbending situations, he is turned into the [[dog girl]] [[futanari]] "[[lass (ego trigger)|Lass]]", yet still retains his voice as a boy. Is in a will-they-won't-they relationship with [[mattie (ego trigger)|Mattie]].

title: lass_(ego_trigger)
body: OC by [[graph (graphiteknight)|]]. Non-canon genderbent form of [[matt_(ego_trigger)|Matt]]. Is a [[futanari]].

title: mattie_(ego_trigger)
body:
[[Original]] character by [[graph (graphiteknight)|]], part of his [[Ego Trigger]] project.

A girl with [[huge breasts]], she's prone to a little (or a lot) of [[breast expansion]]. Her "trigger" has her becoming a [[cow girl]] whenever she sees something she considers cute or develops motherly instincts towards. Is in a will-they-won't-they relationship with [[matt (ego trigger)|Matt]].

title: truck_(ego_trigger)
body:
A main character of [[Graph (graphiteknight)|]]'s [[Ego Trigger]] project.

[[otome (ego trigger)|Otome]]'s boyfriend. His "trigger" turns him into a slender [i][[bishounen]][/i] because of his insecurities about his overly muscular body.

title: airplane_arms
body:
Pretending to be an [[airplane]] by [[spread arms|spreading the arms]] straight out to the sides, usually while running or otherwise in motion.

In Japanese, the [[sound effects|sound effect]] of an [[airplane]] flying is ブーン ("bu-n"). Consequently, airplane arms are known as "bu-n" in Japanese. "Bu-n" is also a nickname and catchphrase of "内藤ホライゾン" (Naitou Horizon), an [[ASCII art]] character who is a mascot for [[2channel]]'s VIP board.

h4. Examples

* !post #169049
* !post #7784157

h4. See also

* [[Spread arms]]

h4. External links

* "2ch Ascii-art Illustrations (JP): 'Naitou Horizon'":http://riceballman.fc2web.com/AA-Illust/Data/NaitoHorizon.html

title: night_raven_college_school_uniform
body:
The standard [[school uniform]] worn by students of Night Raven College in [[Twisted Wonderland]]. Students wear a [[white shirt|white]] [[dress shirt]], a [[striped necktie]], a [[black jacket|black]] [[blazer]] and [[black pants]], and a [[waistcoat]] in the color corresponding to their dorm. Some students also style their neckties as bowties.

Not to be confused with the formal dorm uniforms worn by each of the individual dorms.

title: shark_meme_(meme)
body:
A Japanese [[meme]] from August 2025, originating from a product photo of a [[shark costume]]. The original image features a cartoon shark with the [[thought bubble]]:
「家でもパーティーでも、エッチな服を着て友達や家族を怖がらせましょう！」 "Scare your friends and family by wearing sexy clothes at home or at a party!"
The strange wording (probably a machine translation from Chinese) and goofy-looking shark led to images of characters with the same distinctively formatted thought bubble, announcing similar nefarious intentions. h4. Examples * !asset #31126115: Origin
other_names: 家でもパーティでも、エッチな服を着て友達や家族を怖がらせましょう!

title: toaru_majutsu_no_index
body:
とある魔術の禁書目録 ([i]Toaru Majutsu no Kinsho Mokuroku[/i]), read as [i]Toaru Majutsu no Index[/i] (インデックス), lit. [i]A Certain Magical Index of Prohibited Books[/i], or simply [i]A Certain Magical Index[/i].

A light novel series by Kamachi Kazuma, with illustrations by [[Haimura Kiyotaka]]. 

Also adapted into a manga, with art by [[Kogino Chuuya]], a spin-off manga, [[ToAru Kagaku no Railgun]] by [[Fuyukawa Motoi]], and a 2008 anime by [[J.C. Staff]].

title: misaka_mikoto
body:
An [[electricity]]-wielding middle schooler from [[ToAru Majutsu no Index]], and protagonist of the spinoff manga [[ToAru Kagaku no Railgun]].

She has the ability to [[electrokinesis|use electricity]] in various ways, such as shooting it, using it to shoot other items as projectiles (hence her nickname [[railgun (misaka mikoto)|]]), and electromagnetism.

She has [[brown eyes]], [[medium hair|medium]] [[brown hair]], and [[small breasts]], [[breast envy|much to her chagrin]]. She also wears a [[hairpin]]. She wears the standard [[Tokiwadai school uniform]] with [[short shorts]] [[shorts under skirt|under her skirt]] and [[loose socks|loose]] [[white_socks|white]] [[ankle socks]].

In [[Blue Archive]], her halo features a [[lightning bolt symbol]]. She also wields a modified [[FN F2000]] named "Gunvolt" (itself a reference to "[[Azure Striker Gunvolt]]", hence the name).

h4. Appearance

* !asset #20667329
* !post #7504597: [[Blue Archive]]
* !post #5331610: [[Misaka Mikoto level 6 shift]]

h4. Related characters

* [[Misaka Imouto]]: Looks about the same but usually has a [[night vision device]].  Also, while Mikoto has shorts on under her skirt, this one only has [[striped panties]].
* [[Dolly (toaru kagaku no railgun)|]]: Looks about the same but usually has [[long hair]].
* [[Last Order (toaru Majutsu No Index)|]]: Much [[child|younger]] looking than the other two and the only one with an [[ahoge]].
* [[Misaka Worst]]: Looks slightly [[aged up]] and wears a light [[grey bodysuit]] (in a [[ToAru Majutsu no Index: Old Testament|WWIII arc]]) or a [[white dress|white]] [[Ao dai]] (in a [[ToAru Majutsu no Index: New Testament|New Testament]]). 
* [[Misaka Misuzu]]: Mikoto's [[mother and daughter|mother]]. Looks very young for [[mature female|her age]] (just slightly older than Misaka Worst) and has [[large breasts]].

h4. See also

* [[Gekota]]
* [[Only My Railgun]]
* [[Railgun (Misaka Mikoto)]]

* "Wikipedia: Mikoto Misaka":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mikoto_Misaka

body:
A [[screentones|screentoning]] technique resembling [[halftone]], using a pattern of dots of [b]equal[/b] size, shape, and spacing, which is then applied to a given work to add texture and/or shade.

If the dots are of varying sizes, use [[halftone]] instead.

h4. Examples

* !post #1500677: [[Ben-Day dots]] over the hair and faces vs [[Halftone]] over the background
* !post #8621094
* !post #7691206

title: x-men
body:
A comic book franchise owned and published by [[Marvel]].

[[Marvel|Set in a world]] where a race of humans, dubbed "mutants", that are born with superhuman abilities that manifest during puberty (sometimes at birth), coexists with normal humans. Due to several mutants exploiting their powers for sinister purposes, the world of X-Men is predominantly ruled by anti-mutant leaders who seeks to exterminate all mutants, along with social discrimination against them not dissimilar to racism.

The franchise centered around the eponymous "X-Men" organization founded by  [[Charles Xavier|Prof. Charles Francis Xavier]], who seeks to unite all benevolent mutants to combat the villianous mutants in hope of creating the world where both humans and mutants can peacefully coexists.

title: kitty_pryde
body: Katherine Anne "Kitty" Pryde is a character appearing in American comic books published by [[marvel|Marvel Comics]], commonly in association with the [[X-Men]]. The character first appeared in The Uncanny X-Men #129 (January 1980) and was co-created by writer-artist John Byrne and writer Chris Claremont. A mutant, Pryde possesses a "phasing" ability that allows her to pass through objects, hence she is intangible while using this ability. This power also disrupts any electrical field she passes through, and lets her simulate levitation.

title: rocket_power
body: Rocket Power is an American animated television series created by Arlene Klasky and Gábor Csupó and produced by Klasky Csupo and Nickelodeon Animation Studio for [[Nickelodeon]]. The show centers on the daily lives of Otto, Reggie, Twister and Sam, four pre-adolescent children with an interest in extreme sports such as skateboarding and surfing while also getting into various situations.

title: hoolay_(honkai:_star_rail)
body:
A non-playable [[Honkai: Star Rail]] boss character, appearing with the 2.4/2.5 Trailblaze Continuance story. 

He is the leader of the [[wolf|Borisin]], and the archenemy of the Foxians.

For when he disguised as a [[fox boy|Foxian]], see [[hoolay_(foxian)_(honkai:_star_rail)]]. 

h4. Appearance 
* !post #9841672

title: hoolay_(foxian)_(honkai:_star_rail)
body:
The disguised Foxian form of Hoolay. He has [[red eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]], white [[beard]], [[fox ears]], a [[muscular]] build, and a [[chest tattoo]] on his left pectoral. He also wears a [[long sleeves|long-sleeved]] [[blue shirt]] in the [[hadanugi dousa]] style, [[bandages]] on his chest, [[grey pants]], and [[black boots|black]] [[ankle boots]].

For his true form see [[Hoolay (Honkai: Star Rail)]].

title: doro_(nikke)
body:
A [[meme]] character based on [[Dorothy (nikke)|]] from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. Has also been referred to as "Dororong", "Dororo", and "La creatura" (a nickname it shares with [[Neco-Arc]]). Its appearance was based on a peculiar fanart of [[Stella Unibell]] from [[Soulworker]] as a chibi dog.

It originated from the Korean NIKKE "forums":[https://arca.live/e/33292?target=tag&keyword=%EB%8B%88%EC%BC%80&p=] but has quickly spread to other communities such as [[Blue Archive]], [[Honkai: Star Rail]], and [[Hololive]]. The meme also gained attention from the developers themselves, [[Shift Up]] with the CEO, [[Kim Hyung Tae]] and his wife [[KKUEM]] are "seen holding a Santa-esque Doro plush alongside Shuhei Yoshida":[https://x.com/yosp/status/1778902056721592730]. The 2024 April Fools event for the game also features [[Matis (nikke)|Matis]] in the form of Doro as [[Syuen (nikke)|]]'s burst skill. The game's developers officially acknowledged the meme during the 2025 April Fools event where they hosted a joke award show known as "Doroscar" as well as official merch of the Nikkes resembling Doro. Moreover, their other game, [[Stellar Blade]] features Doro in the game's crossover.

This tag is also applicable to any character that gets the "Dorofication" treatment, not just Dorothy's Doro.

h4. Appearance

* !asset #25619367

h4. See also

* [[Doro orange story (nikke)|]] 

h4. External links

* "Know Your Meme: Dororong":[https://knowyourmeme.com/memes/dororong]

body:
Hair that is not attached to the head of the person it belongs to, either fully or partially. Usually in a comedic setting. Commonly seen on [[Akaza Akari]] or [[hololive]]'s [[Aki Rosenthal]].

title: changing_clothes
body:
The act of taking off one's attire, costume, or outfit in order to put on another. May or may not entail removal of [[underwear]].

Not to be confused with [[costume switch]], which is for two characters each wearing the other's clothes simultaneously.

title: heretics_(nikke)
body:
A "squad" from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

Traitor Nikkes who fight for the Raptures and their Queen, hybridized with Rapture technology and armor to serve as her agents. Throughout the Rapture Invasions, many Heretics form their own subfactions:

h5. Offspring

A group of Heretics with unknown goals. Named after various philosophies or ideologies.

* [[Nihilister (nikke)|]]
* [[Liberalio (nikke)|]]
* [[Indivilia (nikke)|]]

h5. [[Four Beasts (nikke)|]]

Four Heretics named after mythological creatures in the Bible. They are Heretics with different goals from their kin, however, the Four Beasts hold a grudge against the Offsprings for disregarding them.

* [[Behemoth (nikke)|]]
* [[Leviathan (nikke)|]]
* Bahamut
* [[Ziz (nikke)|]]

So far [[Modernia (nikke)|]] is the only Heretic that is not yet confirmed to be in any Heretic factions.
other_names: ヘレティック(勝利の女神:NIKKE)
